stravaSettings.title: Strava Settings
stravaSettings.subtitle: Manage your Strava app credentials
stravaSettings.technicalDescription: This process requires creating a Strava API application. Please follow these steps carefully.

step1.title: Go to Strava's API Settings
step1.description: Click the button below. It will open Strava's API settings page in a new tab so you can easily switch back here to copy your credentials.
step1.note: This will open in a new tab so you can easily copy your credentials.

step2.title: Configure Your Application
step2.applicationNameDesc: Choose any name you like (e.g., "My Sport Year")
step2.websiteDesc: Enter any website URL (e.g., your personal site or just use a placeholder like https://example.com)
step2.callbackImportant: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: Enter ONLY the domain without port number:
step2.callbackNote: Copy this value exactly. Do not include "http://", "https://", or port numbers.

step3.title: Copy Your Credentials
step3.description: After creating your app, Strava will show you a Client ID and Client Secret. Copy these values and enter them below.

stravaSettings.securityDescription: Your credentials are stored locally in your browser only. They never leave your device.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.note: Sync checks for new activities. Clear cache to force a full refresh.
dataManagement.syncConfirm: Sync activities from Strava? This will check for new or updated activities.
dataManagement.clearConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all cached activity data? This will force a full refresh on the next sync. This does NOT delete your Strava data, only the local cache.

stravaSettings.clearCredentialsConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear your Strava credentials? You will need to set them up again.

step1.title: Welcome to Sport Year!
step1.description: Create beautiful Year in Review summaries of your athletic achievements. Let's get you started!

step2.title: Add a Background Image
step2.description: Personalize your Year in Review with a custom hero background. Upload your favorite photo or use a URL.

step3.title: Configure Filters
step3.description: Customize which activities appear in your review. Exclude activity types, filter virtual activities, or hide specific workouts.

step4.title: You're All Set!
step4.description: Your Year in Review is ready! Click the "üì± Social Card" button to create a shareable image for social media.

charts.title: Interactive Charts
charts.description: View your progress with detailed stats

map.title: Activity Map
map.description: See where you trained throughout the year
